NowA: Congratulations! You now have the rank of: {0}
Information:
HumanitySystem is the system based off of the DayZ mod humanity. DayZ's humanity system was a way to rank a player based on how they kill and how they interact with other players. 
Ranks: 
 *Hero(2500+ humanity) 
 *Bandit(2500 and less humanity) 
 *Neutral(Anything between hero and bandit)
